data.name: How Sweet It Is
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Famed theater director Jack Cosmo (Joe Piscopo) is down on his luck and owes a large sum of money to Big Mike (Paul Sorvino) a violent loan shark. Luckily Big Mike is a fan of Cosmo's work, and makes him an offer he can't refuse: Put on a new hit show in under a week, and his debts will be forgiven. The catch is he can only use people also in debt to Big Mike, the main issue is they are all drug users, criminals, or insane. Complicating matters further is that the F.B.I. is investigating Big Mike, and decides to send in field agent, and musical theater aficionado Ethan Trimble (Erich Bergen) to investigate his connection to Cosmo. Attempting to help Jack find his muse so they can continue the investigation, Ethan recruits Jack's estranged daughter Sarah (Erika Christensen) to reconcile with her father. Will they be able to put on the show in time, or will it be curtains for Jack?

data.short_description: Famed theater director Jack Cosmo is down on his luck and owes a large sum of money to Big Mike, a violent loan shark. Luckily Big Mike is a fan of Cosmo's work, and makes him an offer he can't refuse: put on a new hit show in under a week, and his debts will be forgiven.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
